patthana21.7:4.1: Naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:4.2: Naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:5.1: Naanāsavaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:6.1: Nasāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:6.2: Naanāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:6.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
